caption.p: Gap analysis of the giant panda in Qinling Mountains. Codes of the reserves: 1—Banqiao, 2—Changqing, 3—Foping, 4—Guanyinshan, 5—Hangzhongzhuhuan, 6—Huangbaiyuan, 7—Huangguanshan, 8—Laoxiancheng, 9—Motianling, 10—Niangniangshan, 11—Niubeiliang, 12—Panlong, 13—Pingheliang, 14—Sanyuan, 15—Taibainiuweihe, 16—Taibaishan, 17—Tianhuashan, 18—Yingzuishi, 19—Zhouzhi
